text: The List is a Canadian reality television series, which debuted on November 13, 2007 on Slice. Hosted by Liza Fromer, the show will give participants the opportunity to live out a dream or goal. ==References== * The List - Casting Call * Liza Fromer interview on Sounds Like Canada, August 15, 2007 ==External links== * The List * Category:2007 Canadian television series debuts Category:Slice (TV channel) original programming Category:Television series by Corus Entertainment Category:2000s Canadian reality television series
title: The List (Canadian TV program)
